entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
